subtitle: Acorn squash is served stuffed with the tasty mushroom and couscous mixture.

method.text: Slice the tops off the squash. Remove and discard the seeds. Place the hollowed out squash on a baking tray. Bake for 35-40 min or until tender.
Place the couscous in a small bowl. Pour over enough boiling water to cover. Cover with cling film. Leave to soak for 10 min.
In a large frying pan, melt the margarine. Saute the garlic and leek for 2-3 min.
Add the mushrooms. Saute for 1 min.
Stir in the beans, tomatoes, herbs, couscous and seasoning. Heat through.
Slice a small piece off the base of each squash so it stands up. Pile the filling into the cavities and serve.

title: Couscous, mushroom and mung bean stuffed acorn squash
